WorkItem.Description:
Not sure but when i talent in Elemental Weapons and Improved Shields in the enhancment tree for elemental shamans the stats/dps/mps ratings on the stat tab don't change. Also checking and unchecking Glyph of Elemental Mastery doesnt seem to change anything ethier.
Â 
Is this a bug?

Comments.Message: Scratch "Also checking and unchecking Glyph of Elemental Mastery doesnt seem to change anything ethier." it was cause i didn't notice that i cleared the talents so Elemental Mastery wasn't talented. but stiil the other 2 problems till seem to be a problem.

1. Improved Shield won't add a shred of dps as far as I know, since it is not assumed that a mob will hit you. So what would shields do?

2. I will add Elemental Weapons implementation

3. The current "estimation" model doesn't include glyph of elemental mastery I think; the "simulation" model does but is a lot slower. Also, on many fights you won't see a difference anyway whether you include that glyph or not.

What I was looking at for the Improved Shields is the mana regeneration will change the times of oom and overall dps vs. time. 
Thanks for looking into the Elemental Weapon.
I found out the glyph works i forgot i cleared the talents witch removes Elemtal Mastery all together witch nuls the glyph too.

Oops. I totally missed Water Shield. Sorry, my shammy isn't that high level yet :S
It is implemented, along with Glyph of Water Mastery.
